synthesis_analysis: The system excels at providing validating, practical advice and adapting techniques like micro-tasking. Its main weakness is a one-size-fits-all approach to pacing and a tendency to overlook core beliefs or physiological symptoms of anxiety. To improve, it must better tailor challenge progression to individual readiness and directly address underlying assumptions. The highest priority is evolving more nuanced user profiling to dynamically adjust support for anxiety levels and confidence.
